70010000001284.description:
Owlboy is a story-driven platform adventure game, where you can fly and explore a brand new world in the clouds! Pick up your friends, and bring them with you as you explore the open skies. Overcome obstacles and greater enemies, in one of the most detailed adventures of this era.

Being a mute, Otus struggles living up to the expectations of owl-hood. Things spiral from bad to worse with the sudden appearance of sky pirates. 

What follows is a journey through monster infested ruins, with unexpected encounters, well kept secrets, and burdens no one should have to bear.

• A love letter to pixel art for a new audience, Owlboy is a story-driven action adventure, with a unique mix of flight and platforming.
• Carry anything. Recruit Otus’s friends as gunners to fight for you, each with unique abilities and stories.
• Large dungeons with big and challenging boss battles.
• An adventure 10 years in the making.
70010000001284.name: Owlboy

70010000049135.description:
The age of peace is on the brink of collapse. Diplomacy has failed. You must act before all is lost. Survive the danger, cleanse the rift, protect your world.

Aluna Rift is a challenging arcade space shooter with solo, co-op and PVP game modes. In the main game you will embark on a journey to hunt and destroy colossal bosses hidden in the depths of space. There is also an ‘Endless Survival’ mode akin to classic shoot ‘em ups, pitting your best scores against players from around the world.
70010000049135.intro: Cosmic chaos, neon lasers, and bosses that delight in your demise. Frantic, fierce, and endlessly replayable. Go solo or team up for co-op mayhem!
70010000049135.name: Aluna Rift

70010000069577.description:
When Renmaru Mido punches and kicks his way into that den of delinquents known as Doshu High School,
is he destined to become a legend, or to go down as just another martyr?

This isn't some plain old belt scroller where you and a buddy fight against Yanki hordes. This is a totally evolved, sick beat 'em up, baby!

■Hot! Super stylin' fighting action.
Clobber Yankis using 10 Special Moves, not to mention kicking and punching, running, and defending!

■Screamin' Hot! No limit to strength with the fighting-mahjong system.
This mahjong-themed system that punctuates each fight can strengthen your Yanki abilities and base actions!
Go wild with constantly evolving hyper-fighting action!

■Smokin'! A buddy to the rescue with partner slots!
On-screen partner slots start spinning when the fighting tension begins to rise! When it stops, your partner comes to help, taking the role it lands on!

■A group drama woven with the fists and words of delinquents
Every single delinquent character is wildly unique! A new generation brawl story told in an unprecedented style!　Player Two can have fun backing up their buddy at the partner slots and show them some brotherly love!
70010000069577.intro: Japan's Triple B title hittin' the shelves!  fighting and flaunting their 'tudes, add in three entirely new game systems, and you get a sick beat 'em up!
70010000069577.name: BAD BOY BROTHER

70010000090509.description:
The Bee Hive is a colourful, hand-crafted 3D platformer inspired by the golden age of platforming classics. Built entirely by one developer over 9 years, this solo passion project is packed with charm, chaos and a surprising sting in its tail.

The insect kingdom is in danger. Mecha-Spider has sent a rogue signal, leading a full-blown spider uprising to shatter the elemental stones and destroy the natural world as we know it.

As Honeybee, you'll dash, sting, climb, zipline, and swim through 16 vibrant levels. From tropical jungles and lava gorges to frozen peaks, floating castles, cyberpunk spider cities and even outer space - on a mission to bring balance back to the insect realm and defeat Mecha-Spider.

You won’t face it alone. Alongside you are:
Dasher the Snail – your slowest but most loyal hype-man
Lovebug the Ladybird – your high-flying, brave bug bestie
Mr. Spider – a mysterious ally (or is he?) who may know more than he lets on

With fully-voiced characters, bee powers to unlock, quirky gadgets and weapons, dozens of collectibles, platforming puzzles and Lovebug’s flying missions, The Bee Hive is a nostalgic blast for fans of classic adventure.

Key Features:
16 handcrafted levels across vibrant biomes
Unlock bee powers: sting, shield, climb, zipline, swim
Gadgets and weapons to find, build, and use
Fully-voiced insect cast full of charm and secrets
Collect gems, gear, gadgets, and memories
Built solo over 9 years with love, spite, and a lot of bugs… the good kind!

If you miss the colour, character, and collectathons of the N64™ era - buzz in.

Welcome to The Bee Hive.
70010000090509.intro: Defend the insect kingdom from the spiders, in this colourful 3D action-adventure platformer, The Bee Hive! Crafted entirely by one developer, a love letter to the platformers of old.
70010000090509.name: The Bee Hive

70010000098565.description:
SCP: CONTROL ERROR is a short, first-person psychological horror game set in 1985

You are Barry Gittings - a man who volunteered for a classified experiment inside the Vortex Complex, a remote underground facility established during the Cold War.

You don’t know what’s behind the next door.
You don’t know who’s watching.
You only know the doors opened, the voice welcomed you, and the test began.

Explore sealed research chambers. Solve strange cognitive trials. Read internal reports and documents left behind by those who came before - or maybe didn’t leave at all.

No jump scares. No gunfights. Just you, the test, and something you can’t quite see.
70010000098565.intro: SCP: CONTROL ERROR is a short psychological horror game where you take part in a live experiment inside a restricted underground facility. The test begins. You're observed.
70010000098565.name: SCP: Control Error

70010000100571.description:
You were tricked by your friends. After the latest events, you’ll need to delve deeper into the mysterious establishment of Banban’s Kindergarten.

Now, you’re completely on your own - your friends are either dead or against you…
From now on, you’ll only meet new enemies, who will make sure you never feel alone. Be careful - in Banban’s Kindergarten, they are lurking in every corner, waiting for you.

The future of everything depends on you. Survive the most obscure levels of Banban’s Kindergarten and get closer to the truth!

Additional languages:
- Arabic (AR),
- Bulgarian (BG/БЪЛГАРСКИ),
- Czech (CZ/ČEŠTINA),
- Danish (DK/DANSK),
- Finnish (FIN/SUOMI),
- Hungarian (HU/MAGYAR),
- Indonesian (IDN/INDONESIA),
- Norwegian (NOR/NORGE),
- Polish (PL/POLSKI),
- Romanian (ROU/ROMÂNĂ),
- Russian (RUS/РУССКИЙ),
- Swedish (SE/SVENSKA),
- Turkish (TUR/TÜRKÇE),
- Ukrainian (UA/УКРАЇНСЬКА).
70010000100571.intro: Explore the most obscure levels of Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive the new deceives and mysteries that await you. Uncover the truth behind the place, and find your missing child…
70010000100571.name: Garten of Banban 8: Anti Devil

70010000100895.description:
Have you ever wanted to relive a cartridge-era adventure? Now’s your chance!
In Doki Monsters: Quest, you set out to find your missing childhood friend — teaming up with captured creatures, battling turn-by-turn, and pushing deeper into a dangerous open world. 

Grow stronger, unlock new routes, and face off against Rangers and shady corporations that disturb the peace.

Prefer comfort with your challenge? Modern touches keep the journey smooth: fast-forward battles, optional helper tips, and a quest log that keeps your goals crystal clear. Choose between an 8-bit or piano soundtrack, switch up retro color palettes, and make the adventure yours.

What the adventure offers:
- 140+ original monsters to collect, train, and evolve your strategy.
- About a 20 hour story spanning 15+ towns, plus caves, shrines, seas, and mountains.
- Turn-based battles against Rangers and corporations, with seamless overworld encounters.
- Rare-hunt post-game content and 7 alternate looks per monster (one ultra-rare!).
- Fast-forward battles, optional tips, and a clear quest log — you choose your way of playing!
- Possibility to select 8-bit or piano OST, toggle 20+ retro color palettes, and choose from 9 playable characters.
- Side activities — everyone’s favorite — FISHING!
- 4 save files available in case you would like to share your world with your friends!

Sharpen your strategy, build the ultimate team, and bring a friend home!

Doki Monsters: Quest’s amazing adventure awaits you!
70010000100895.intro: Catch creatures, choose your style, and conquer the quest to save your friend.
70010000100895.name: Doki Monsters : Quest

70010000101778.description:
We are the Whatever Club!
The super-popular singing group “Melon Parker” is now in a visual novel game!
This is the youthful story you’ll experience together with MELON PARKER -We are Whatever Club!-

◆Synopsis
We are the Whatever Club!

You and your five childhood friends,
Naroya, Samurai Sho, Soraneko, KAITO, and Kamome,
are members of the private Melonpan High School’s “Whatever Club”!

While cheerfully solving the incidents that happen at school and enjoying your high school life,
you suddenly get the chance to perform at a music festival!?

Can the “Whatever Club” succeed at
the big stage of the music festival?

And where will your youthful story with the five of them lead...

◆Characters
・Naroya (cv. Naroya)
A reliable member who supports you in the Whatever Club.
Uses sharp reasoning skills to solve the mysteries that happen at school.

・Samurai Sho (cv. Samurai Sho)
The Whatever Club’s quick-witted man.
Sometimes ends up in unfortunate situations because of the other members’ wild ideas.

・Soraneko (cv. Soraneko)
Easygoing by nature, and sometimes ends up pulling the others along.
Loves snacks and games, and often invites you to join in.

・KAITO (cv. KAITO)
The self-proclaimed dark hero of the Whatever Club with a eighth-grader syndrome.
Has a kind heart and will always stand by friends and those in trouble.

・Kamome (cv. Kamome)
A gourmet who, like KAITO, also has eighth-grader syndrome tendencies.
Has a mature way of thinking and so the other members often rely on him.
70010000101778.intro: The super-popular singing group “Melon Parker” is now in a visual novel game!
70010000101778.name: MELON PARKER -We are Whatever Club!-

70010000102815.description:
Combining the speed of an arcade racer with the brawling of a fighting game, this cult classic made its mark with its originality and its own dose of chaos and personality. 
Race on tracks filled with obstacles and crazy settings (from Mount Rushmore to Transylvania), use special moves to knock out your rivals, and explore modes that go far beyond traditional racing.
Get ready to laugh, crash, accelerate, and fight for every corner.
Street Racer Collection is pure arcade fun, straight from the past to your screen.
–
4 game modes
Practice: train before competing for real.
Head-to-Head: race against a single opponent on a track of your choice.
Championship: create your own competitions by combining tracks and difficulty levels.
Rumble Mode: knock your opponents out of the arena!
Soccer Mode: play soccer... with race cars! (not available in the MS-DOS version)
–
What you'll find
4 games in 1: the collection includes the Super NES™, Megadrive, MS-DOS, and Game Boy™ versions of the game.
Up to 27 unique tracks full of shortcuts, traps, and challenges
8 cartoon characters with crazy vehicles and special attacks
Varied racing options: from a quick lap to 80-lap marathons!
Local multiplayer for up to 4 players (on Super NES™, Megadrive, and MS-DOS versions)
–
Why play Street Racer Collection?
A true cult classic, remembered to this day for its creativity and boldness
Unique and pioneering mix of kart racing + combat
Guaranteed fun in both solo and local multiplayer modes
A piece of video game history, preserved in its original form and experience
Get ready to laugh, crash, accelerate, and fight for every corner.
Street Racer Collection is pure arcade fun, straight from the past to your screen.
70010000102815.intro: Run, fight, and win! Speed and brawls on crazy tracks! A classic that mixes racing and fighting, bringing back chaotic battles and irreverent humor for up to 4 players!
70010000102815.name: Street Racer Collection (QUByte Classics)

70010000103152.description:
Star Ores Inc. is an intergalactic mining adventure that catapults you onto an abandoned space station in the middle of the cosmos. As a newly-minted entrepreneur, you start your career in a world full of ore, machines, and galactic possibilities.

Dig through massive asteroids and mine rare minerals, which you refine into valuable high-tech products. With the help of specialized robots, conveyor systems, and automated setups, you build an efficient production chain - from raw extraction to sales.

But that's just the beginning:
- Explore hidden sectors, reactivate old terminals, and upgrade your laser to uncover even deeper treasures. Alien biomass is waiting to be cleared away by you.
- Customers from all corners of the galaxy flock to your station to buy your products.
- Activate the station, perfect your processes, and become a legend of space mining.

Launch your career with Star Ores Inc. now.
70010000103152.intro: Take over an abandoned space station and manage your own ore mine. Carve through the asteroid with your laser, sell ore, and build an automated network of robot helpers.
70010000103152.name: Star Ores Inc.

70010000104854.description:
As an adventurer party based in the capital city of Isigwere, take on a wide range of quests—from small requests by townsfolk, like dealing with goblins, to the queen’s grand command to defeat the dragon that awakened in the underground ruins. Can you stop the world’s destruction and rise as the legendary hero?

- A dungeon crawler RPG where you grow stronger while exploring 15 dungeons.
- Choose 4 members from 21 classes such as Fighter and Ranger to form your party.
- Accept quests, hunt for treasure, and power up through auto battles.
- Make use of new equipment and skills to gain the upper hand in battle.
- Take on increasingly powerful foes and bosses in replayable runs.
70010000104854.intro: Explore dungeons, grow stronger, and slay the dragon to become a hero!
70010000104854.name: Dragon Ruins II

70010000104921.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Geumsan-gun, Korea with "Real" footage! 
There are a total of 3 flight courses in 2 areas.
 high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery.
70010000104921.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Geumsan-gun

70010000105601.description:
Move through 3D space to find hints, solve mysteries and escape from the room.
Anyone can play to the end because you can see hints and answers.
70010000105601.name: Escape game R00M07

70010000105639.description:
Step into a world where love, temptation, and fate collide.

A mysterious demon appears before you with a chilling challenge:
win the heart of your university professor… or be dragged into the depths of hell.

As your conversations grow more intimate, every word pulls you closer to him... and to the darkness that follows.

Will you surrender to the demon’s wicked game, or defy him and carve your own destiny?

Your choices matter... and every ending reveals a different truth about desire, freedom, and the price of love.


Features:

● MULTIPLE ENDINGS: Every path leads to a different fate...  and a different version of you.

● CHOICE & CONSEQUENCE: What you say changes everything, even who survives.

● SUPERNATURAL ROMANCE: A forbidden love story twisted by temptation, mystery, and male desire.

● ATMOSPHERIC EXPERIENCE: Beautiful art and haunting music that pull you deeper into the dark.


It’s seductive.
It’s dangerous.
It’s your soul on the line.

Are you ready to play his game?
70010000105639.intro:
What if the price of love… was your soul? 
Make your choice… before it’s made for you.
70010000105639.name: Anime School Love: His Teacher Secret Lesson

70010000106127.description:
Bowling can be played not only in the hall and only on a straight track. And who says you can't use bombs or springs in the game?   

You can also knock down bottles, and it's a lot more fun. Find out how the game differs from classic bowling. Unlock new levels and you'll be surprised that not everything is as easy as it seems.    

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Each level has a solution - try to beat it in one shot!
70010000106127.intro: You have never played bowling like this before.
70010000106127.name: Pin Strike

70010000106302.description:
Emoji Rampage – Origins throws you into a chaotic, rogue-like first-person shooter where emojis aren’t just harmless faces — they’re deadly enemies.
Start each run by customizing your experience with unique modifiers: crank up the difficulty, make every emoji wear a ridiculous hat, or turn on bouncing mode for hilarious chaos. Then pick your unlocked arena — from The Bouncy Castle to Candy World or even outer space — each with its own hazards and interactive traps.
Armed with only a pistol, you’ll face waves of emojis that charge, dash, fly, shoot, shield themselves, explode, and overwhelm you with sheer numbers. Kill them, collect glowing experience orbs, and level up to choose from powerful upgrades. Will you improve your damage, speed, or reload time? Unlock stronger weapons? Or summon explosive chaos to wipe out swarms at once? Every decision shapes your survival run.
As the arena fills with bouncing, exploding, and bullet-spewing emojis, the game becomes a frantic dance of dodging, aiming, and managing your ammo while exploiting map hazards like explosive sweets or damaging zones to survive longer. The further you go, the crazier it gets — until you’re finally overwhelmed. But every run earns progress, new arenas, and more chaos for your next rampage.
Do you have what it takes to survive the emoji apocalypse?
70010000106302.intro: Blast through endless swarms of chaotic emojis in this fast-paced rogue-like FPS! Unlock arenas, collect power-ups, and survive the madness.
70010000106302.name: Emoji Rampage - Origins

70010000106434.description: Sharpen your axes and get ready to slide into adventure! In Slide Viking, every move matters as you glide across the grid, smash crates, and collect the treasure chests hidden throughout the kingdom. What starts as a simple journey quickly becomes a true test of logic and planning. You play as a bold viking whose mission is clear: gather every chest of gold the land has to offer. With continuous sliding movement, you’ll need to think several steps ahead, undo mistakes infinitely, and break obstacles that stand in your way. The puzzles grow trickier with each level, mixing clever layouts and satisfying “aha!” moments. The game features 30 handcrafted puzzles across two unique settings. Begin in the Village, a humble place of wood and earth where your skills are forged. Then, prove your worth inside the Castle, the richest and most fortified place in the realm, with stone walls and floors that raise the challenge. Whether you’re after a casual puzzle to relax with or a series of smart challenges to conquer, Slide Viking delivers a journey full of brains, treasure, and plenty of sliding fun.
70010000106434.name: Slide Viking

70010000106482.description:
Concealed is a suspenseful school horror adventure based on real-life urban legends. 
At Di Yingling High School, several girls mysteriously vanish. 
Beneath the surface lies a truth wrapped in shadows. 
Exchange student Meng Jiangnan is drawn into the mystery, step by step uncovering secrets buried deep within the campus.
The Remake reimagines the original’s chilling atmosphere with a striking black-and-white comic style, enhanced performances, and upgraded systems for a more immersive experience.

Features:200,000+ words of branching narrative across 7 chapters and dozens of locations, for over 10 hours of gameplay.
Multiple routes and endings: every choice could lead to salvation… or doom.
Unique presentation: black-and-white comic panels and dreamlike sequences blur the line between reality and illusion.
Ensemble storytelling: over 20 characters, each hiding clues or secrets.
Series connection: shares the same universe as Ghost in the Pool and Weirdo, completing the broader “Parallel” mythos.

Concealed is more than a horror story—it marks the beginning of a campus urban legend.Will you follow Meng Jiangnan into the whirlpool of truth?
70010000106482.intro: At DYL High, whispers of missing girls spread. Exchange student Meng Jiangnan confronts the school’s hidden darkness in comic noir style.
70010000106482.name: Concealed

70010000106718.description:
Let's make pizza on the Nintendo Switch™!
Make lots of slices and fill orders one after another!
Keep your slice stock full and serve orders, but don't let anything burn!

Share Joy-Con™, and up to 4 players can join in the fun!
Bake masterfully and aim for the ultimate high score!

《Rules》
Make pizzas to order and serve them to your customers!
To earn the most points, prepare perfect pizzas and don't let them burn!
Bake as many pizzas as you can within the time limit!

《How to Play》
1. Place pizza dough on the counter!
2. Roll out the dough and add toppings!
3. Bake the pizza in the oven!
4. When the pizza is done, cut it and stock the slices!
5. Pick 4 slices to box, then serve them to the customer!

[Score Attack]
Earn a high spot on the global leaderboards!
Make pizzas quickly and accurately, fulfill more and more orders, and aim for a new record!

[Battle]
Compete with up to 4 players!
Be faster and more precise than your opponents to win!
70010000106718.intro:
Roll the dough and add toppings to order!
Serve your customers delicious, fresh-baked pizza!
70010000106718.name: Bake it! Pizza Master

70010000107046.description:
Have fun with your family♪ Find the hidden FOOD!
""Among many FOOD items, one is different.
Spot it within the time limit to enjoy a casual brain-training spot-the-difference game!

How to play is simple:
・Look carefully at the puzzle image
・Once you find the odd one, tap it before time runs out!

It might look easy at first glance,
but with the time ticking, it can be surprisingly tricky!?

If you get stuck,
press the hint button.
(It will show you roughly where to look.)

※In handheld mode, this game is played vertically on Nintendo Switch™.
※Button controls are also supported, so you can enjoy in tabletop or TV mode.

――――――――――――――――――
MASK supports streaming of this game.
No permission is required from MASK for individuals or companies to share gameplay videos.
70010000107046.intro: Have fun with your family♪ Find the hidden FOOD!
70010000107046.name: Where’s the FOOD!?

70010000109153.description:
Welcome to Cozy Toy Shop, a relaxing simulation where you manage your own colorful toy store!
Arrange shelves, decorate your space, craft adorable toys, and make every customer happy.
Earn coins, expand your shop, and unlock new designs — from teddy bears to trains and robots!

Play at your own pace, enjoy the calm atmosphere, and create the most heartwarming store in town.
Perfect for players who love creativity, management, and cozy aesthetics.
70010000109153.intro:
Build, decorate, and run your dream toy shop!
Craft smiles, serve customers, and grow your cozy world.
A relaxing simulation full of charm and color.
70010000109153.name: Cozy Toy Shop

70010000109338.description:
A visual four-choice quiz game that challenges you with all kinds of common-sense questions — the kind that any “ordinary person” should be able to answer!

It’s easy to play：
Read the question carefully, and when you know the answer, just pick the matching image from the four options!
If you choose correctly, you’ll also get to read a detailed explanation.

・Which one is the French dish Fricassée?
・Which is the largest lake in the world?
・Who wrote the lyrics for Beethoven’s “Ninth Symphony”?

…and many more!
If you’ve got the “super-elite” level of common sense, breeze through these so-called easy questions and show off your knowledge to everyone!

Up to 8 players can play together on a single console — perfect for solo brain-training sessions, lively party play, or fun livestream challenges for creators!
70010000109338.intro:
Can a “Top-Tier” Genius Like You
Ace These So-Called “Easy” Questions!?
70010000109338.name: National Quiz of Common Sense

70010000110079.description:
Fight off the employee's infection and get the highest score! In order to get the highest score, cover more space on the immune system field than the opponent.

CURE MODE

Cure 20 infected immune system fields using the Cell Disc vaccine and unlock secret quotes from sick employees!

VS MODE

Battle a friend playing as either Cell Disc or Poison and decide if the infected corporate slave should live or die!

XX

About Bernard Cinemas

In 2004 a local movie theater went out of business leaving their employees without a job. Not too long from it's closure a former employee named Bernard Jays decided to open his own movie theater a year later, and called it Bernard Cinemas. It was an absolute success! Since 2005 Bernard Cinemas became known for it's support of independent films and freshly made popcorn butter! Unfortunately during the early years of prosperity, thousands of employees who made the butter on a daily basis were infected and exposed to it's "Poison".

Infected employees over time reported having fever, god complex, yellow skin, and yellow blood. Many have died due to complications of the Poison, but Bernard Cinemas never lost it's reputation or financial support. The hundreds of deaths did not put a dent in the company's operations. Film companies continued to flock, the wealthy continued to donate, politicians continued to protect, and the unfortunate continued to apply.

Eventually, in 2018 when Bernard Cinemas gained a certain billion dollar threshold, corporate finally took exertion and decided to act by creating a vaccine called "Cell Disc" to combat the Poison. Since then every new generation of infected employees are required to take Cell Disc. Those who were able to survive the one-hour curing process were gifted with overtime and of course free movies! As of today, the Cell Disc vaccine has retained many hard working employees from possible death, giving them a newfound purpose to live and serve Bernard Cinemas forever!

XX
70010000110079.intro: A simple strategy board game featuring 20 different immune systems!
70010000110079.name: Extra Extra Poison NS

70010000110304.description:
About the Game
Find the hidden insects in cute and colorful illustrations!
By spotting the specified insect within the time limit,
you can enjoy a fun and easy brain-training experience.

How to Play
・Take a good look at the insect you need to find.
・Search for the same insect in the illustration.
・When you find it, tap the spot before time runs out!

It might look easy at first,
but the time limit makes it surprisingly tricky!

If you get stuck, the Hint button will gently help you out
by showing the area where the answer is hiding.

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
70010000110304.intro:
Where’s That Insect Hiding?
A Cute and Easy Brain-Training Picture Hunt Game
70010000110304.name: Where’s the Insect?

70010000110358.description:
In the floating world of beauty and illusion, love is the most dangerous secret of all.
You arrive as a stranger… but soon, one glance, one whispered word, changes everything.

Each geisha hides a story  of duty, desire, and dreams long buried beneath layers of silk and silence.
As you grow closer, your choices will shape a fragile bond that could either blossom into forbidden love… or fade like cherry petals in the wind.

Will you be the one to free her heart… or let her disappear into the shadows of tradition?

How far would you go for love that was never meant to be?


Game Features:

● Romance among the blossoms: Fall for captivating geishas, each with her own past, secrets, and emotions waiting to unfold.

● Your choices decide her fate: Comfort her, challenge her, or confess your feelings. Every decision changes your shared destiny.

● A poetic journey through the floating world: Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of beauty, melancholy, and passion.

● Multiple endings: Discover the bittersweet paths of love, freedom, and sacrifice.

● A visual novel of emotion and elegance: Where every word, glance, and gesture can change the course of a heart.


Will you risk everything to love a geisha who can never be yours?
70010000110358.intro: A geisha’s heart longs for freedom… will you be the one to set it free?
70010000110358.name: Geisha's Heart: Romance Among the Cherry Blossoms

70010000110364.description:
In the age of steel and cherry blossoms, love is a forbidden blade.
You arrive as an outsider… but soon, a single glance, a moment of trust, changes everything.

Each samurai carries a story of duty, pride, and a heart trapped between loyalty and desire.
As your bond deepens, every choice you make draws you closer to a love that defies both fate and tradition.

Will you pierce the armor around his heart… or watch him vanish into the path of duty?

How far would you go for a love that could destroy everything?


Game Features:

● Romance among the blossoms: Fall for noble samurais, each with his own past, scars, and secret longing for connection.

● Your choices decide his fate: Encourage his courage, challenge his loyalty, or confess your forbidden love. Every decision shapes your destiny together.

● A poetic journey through honor and passion: Experience the tension between duty, emotion, and the beauty of fleeting love.

● Multiple endings: Discover the paths of devotion, sacrifice, and redemption.

● A visual novel of emotion and elegance: Where every word, look, and silence could change the course of two hearts.


Will you risk everything to love a samurai bound by duty?
70010000110364.intro: A samurai’s heart hides behind honor… will you be the one to make it surrender?
70010000110364.name: Samurai Shoguns Heart: Romance Among the Cherry Blossoms

70010000110795.description:
A simple quiz game where you answer trivia about history, culture, and landmarks from around the world with ○ or ×!

Can the Great Wall of China be seen from space?

Was the Leaning Tower of Pisa built to tilt on purpose?

Do all the Moai statues face the same direction?
...and many more!
Packed with world heritage trivia that you think you know—but maybe don’t!
Test your knowledge of world heritage in this fun true-or-false quiz!

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
70010000110795.intro: Uncover the Truth of World Heritage! A Two-Choice Challenge on Global Facts!
70010000110795.name: World Heritage True or False Quiz

70010000111083.description:
Step into the dark halls of the royal castle with the fearless Red Cape Knight, summoned by the King after dangerous creatures seize his home. Armed with his sword and the magic of his enchanted red cape, the knight must face deadly traps and fierce enemies to reclaim the castle.

With the power to double jump using his cape, dash past danger, and strike with precision, the Red Cape Knight delivers a thrilling platforming experience filled with danger at every corner.

Features:

- Precision platforming entirely set inside the castle
- Deadly traps and hidden dangers
- Double jump with the enchanted cape
- Fast and fluid Dash ability
- Sword combat against dangerous creatures
- Beautiful Pixel Art style
- Immersive and intense soundtrack
70010000111083.intro: The knight must face deadly traps and fierce enemies to reclaim the castle
70010000111083.name: Red Cape Knight

70010000111952.description:
Shoot and align blocks perfectly to unlock the secret and spectacular illustrations.
Play at your own pace: pause each block to place it precisely or shoot them quickly to chain combos, fill the bar, and earn stars.

Test your ingenuity and train your mind!

Boost your working memory by retaining shapes and patterns while creating impressive mosaics.

Enhance your ability to understand positions, proportions, and relationships between objects.

Develop problem-solving skills and adapt to new challenges.

Train your careful observation of colors, edges, and textures to fit each block together correctly.

Features:
 - Difficulty: 7 to 10 mosaic lines.
 - Immerse yourself in the full-screen gallery and enjoy all the unlocked illustrations.
 - CO-OP and VS modes to challenge friends and family. Will you be the fastest?
70010000111952.intro: TetroMosaic is a challenge that combines tetromino pieces to form, step by step, a vibrant mosaic full of textures and colors.
70010000111952.name: TetroMosaic, UnicorN

70010000064012.description:
EL COCO is a 3D action roguelike that plunges you into a world of dreams, broken memories, and living nightmares. Descend into The Uncertain, a place as strange as it is dangerous, and fight to recover what you’ve lost—if you can trust your guide.


FACE YOUR NIGHTMARES

You awaken without memories, trapped in an impossible realm. A strange host:: El Coco, a disturbing figure who promises answers… but only if you dare to descend into the Pit and face horrors born from your own mind. With fast, fluid combat, every move counts. Dodge, strike, and adapt in real-time as relentless enemies swarm from all sides.


DESCEND INTO THE HOLE

Each escape attempt is unique. Face different levels that will test your skill and mettle. Hordes, darkness, time trials... The Hole shifts with every descent, offering new threats, obstacles, and choices. The deeper you go, the closer you get to the truth… and the more dangerous it becomes.


HARNESS FORGOTTEN POWERS

Wield a variety of weapons, unlock PowerUps, and discover mysterious trinkets and relics with unique effects that transform your playstyle. Absorb the strength of mythical creatures and use their powers to your advantage. Combine abilities and bonuses to carve your own path to survival—or madness.


EVERY DESCENT CHANGES YOU

With every run, you’ll uncover fragments of your past, new power combinations, and hidden secrets buried deep below. The choices you make shape your journey—and your fate. Can you remember who you are before you become what you fear most?


MYTHICAL ALLIES AND NIGHTMARE BOSSES

Legends walk beside you—though not always on your side. Creatures like Ratoncito Pérez, El Martinico, or La Xana may offer aid on your descent into the depths. But beware: the Meigas, twisted wardens of the Pit, will stop at nothing to shatter your body and mind.
70010000064012.name: EL COCO

70010000091405.description:
See the world through the eyes of a bee! Explore a world inspired by Central Park as you gather pollen, evade threats, and build your own thriving beehive. This edition combines the original Bee Simulator with The Hive expansion, introducing new mechanics, game modes, and fresh as spring pollen content—all in one buzzing adventure, perfect for players of all ages.

EMBARK ON BIG ADVENTURES AS A LITTLE BEE
Take flight in a heartwarming single-player story where you must protect your hive from looming danger. As one of the swarm’s most diligent workers, your tiny wings will carry the fate of your entire colony.

EXPLORE A VIBRANT, WORLD-FAMOUS PARK
Fly around and explore every nook and cranny of a vast, semi-open world map inspired by New York’s famous Central Park. From ponds to picnic grounds, funfairs to the zoo, you’ll uncover secrets, mini-games, and resources throughout. Find people, animals, plants, and other insects to interact with along the way. 

BUILD YOUR OWN SPRAWLING HIVE
The Hive expansion lets you build and customize your very own beehive from the ground up. Optimize your resource-gathering to collect what you need to create a buzzing home. Use a variety of practical and decorative buildings to bring your hive to life.

MINI-GAMES GALORE
Being a bee means non-stop activity! Race through jet streams, collect pollen, perform bee dances, defend your colony from wasps, and tackle various challenges in an exciting mix of exploration and action-packed gameplay.

SPLIT SCREEN COOP
Team up with a friend or family member in two player split-screen co-op.  Play through custom-designed multiplayer maps with both cooperative and competitive game modes—fun for everyone, young and old!

A VIBRANT AND PEACEFUL SOUNDTRACK
Soar through the world with a peaceful and immersive soundtrack that captures the calmness of nature.
70010000091405.intro: Hive life just got bigger – dive into The Hive expansion in Bee Simulator
70010000091405.name: Bee Simulator: The Hive

70010000105476.description:
Step into the inferno — and fight your way out of hell.

In HELL BLOOD: INFERNO RETRO SHOOTER, you awaken in a world consumed by fire, corruption, and endless war. The sky bleeds red, the ground burns beneath your feet, and every corridor echoes with the screams of the damned. Armed with brutal weapons and unrelenting rage, you’ll carve through demonic legions, unearth forgotten relics, and confront the evil that feeds on your blood.

Inspired by the golden age of ’90s shooters, HELL BLOOD combines classic fast-paced combat with modern roguelike progression and acrobatic movement. Every level is alive — shifting layouts, evolving enemies, and unpredictable encounters keep you on edge. Run, dash, double jump, wall-run, and unleash chaos in a storm of fire and fury.

Key Features:
 • Adrenaline-fueled retro FPS action with intense combat and movement
 • Roguelike progression — each run offers new challenges and rewards
 • Explore diverse, infernal environments from blood-soaked arenas to corrupted temples
 • Upgrade weapons, abilities, and mutations to grow stronger with every run
 • Face colossal bosses and relentless demonic hordes
 • Dynamic traps and hazards that test your skill and reflexes
 • Immersive retro-inspired visuals, atmospheric effects, and a dark synth soundtrack

Blood is not your weakness — it’s your weapon.

Rise from the ashes, embrace the flames, and carve your path through hell itself.
Welcome to HELL BLOOD: Inferno Retro Shooter.
70010000105476.name: HELL BLOOD: INFERNO RETRO SHOOTER

70010000105536.description:
Spend your summer immersed in the quiet beauty of a Scandinavian village, where tradition meets survival. In Scandinavian Cottage Survival Simulator, you’ll take on the role of a young villager helping your family and neighbors through the warm season, balancing work, exploration, and survival in a fully interactive open world.

Build, hunt, fish, and thrive as you take on quests, manage your character’s needs, and master the rhythms of countryside life. Whether you’re chopping wood, repairing old cabins, or crafting tools and shelters from gathered materials, every task connects you to the land and its people.

Key Features:
• Village Life Simulation – Help parents and locals with daily tasks, from construction to gathering supplies.
• Crafting & Building – Construct a cozy hut, campfire, log racks, and more using wood, stone, leather, and glass.
• Fishing & Hunting – Catch fish or hunt wildlife, then cook your meals over an open flame.
• Dynamic World – Experience day or night cycles, shifting weather, and seasonal wildlife behavior.
• Character Management – Monitor hunger, energy, and health as you take on life in the wild.
• Open World & Quests – Explore the countryside, interact with NPCs, buy and sell resources, and complete a variety of quests.

Can you handle the raw beauty and demands of Nordic summer life? Grab your axe, cast your line, and start your journey in Scandinavian Cottage Survival Simulator.
70010000105536.intro: Build your life in the heart of the Scandinavian wilderness.
70010000105536.name: Scandinavian Cottage Survival Simulator

70010000106609.description:
Red Pippy is a charming 2D pixel art platformer that follows the journey of a little red bird in pursuit of its biggest dream: learning to fly!

With each level, Pippy learns new skills as he navigates vibrant and perilous environments, jumping across platforms and overcoming obstacles that bring him closer to his ultimate goal. Will he prove that he's ready to conquer the skies?

Get ready for a journey full of cuteness, adventure, and perseverance in Red Pippy!


Features:
* New abilities are unlocked as the little bird's journey progresses.
* Classic Pixel Art Platformer Style.
* 8-Bit Chiptune Soundtrack.
* Exciting challenges and creative enemies require skill and precision to overcome.
* 60 Levels.
70010000106609.intro: Learn to fly overcoming every challenge possible.
70010000106609.name: Red Pippy

70010000110773.description:
Enter Hentai Portrait- a refined puzzle experience where sensual art meets serene gameplay. Uncover stunning portraits of feminine allure, each crafted with emotion, elegance, and vivid detail. As you assemble each image, you reveal not just a masterpiece, but a moment of quiet admiration.


Soft background music and a soothing atmosphere turn every moment into quiet focus and satisfaction. Whether you’re looking to unwind or simply admire the art you complete, Hentai Portrait offers a peaceful escape into a world of charm and creativity.


KEY FEATURES:
- Over 30 beautiful images to discover and assemble
- Smooth, intuitive puzzle system - focus on the art, not the mechanics
- High-quality visuals rich in color, emotion, and detail
- Relaxing background music that sets a calm, immersive mood
- Gallery mode - revisit and admire your completed artworks anytime
- Perfect for quiet, focused sessions of visual satisfaction
70010000110773.name: Hentai Portrait

70010000110809.description:
Get ready to ignite your engines in Formula Uno Racing — a thrilling single-player experience that captures the intensity of professional Formula Car racing.

Race across a global lineup of high-speed circuits that evolve with the time of day. Tackle sharp turns under the morning sun, chase victory through glowing dusk, and dominate the track beneath dazzling night lights.

Progress through your racing career by unlocking new circuits and earning cash rewards to purchase faster, more powerful cars. Every victory brings you closer to mastering the ultimate racing machine.


Features:
-Authentic Formula Car physics and responsive controls
-Dynamic time-of-day environments: sunny, dawn, and night
-Career progression with unlockable circuits and new car purchases
-Deep vehicle tuning and setup options

Formula Uno Racing — One driver. One dream. Endless speed.
70010000110809.intro: One Race. One Goal. No limits.
70010000110809.name: Formula Uno Racing

70010000111306.description:
Step into Oasis Obby Parkour, a vibrant and fast-paced parkour adventure set in a colorful desert world full of creative challenges and smooth movement.

Run, jump, climb, and wall-bounce your way through dynamic obstacle courses designed to test your timing, precision, and creativity. Each stage offers a unique twist — from shifting platforms to moving traps — all wrapped in a bright, modern visual style.

Features:

>Fluid Parkour Gameplay – Enjoy responsive controls that make every jump and landing feel satisfying.

>Challenging Courses – Master handcrafted level filled with clever platforming and surprising obstacles.

>Relaxed Desert Atmosphere – Explore a sun-soaked oasis with warm colors and an upbeat soundtrack.
70010000111306.name: Oasis Obby Parkour

70070000030808.description:
Immerse yourself in the world of bowling with Bowling Fever!

Test your skills in countless game modes, visit amazingly realistic 3D locations, play fantastic mini-games and discover dozens of new bowling balls and pins!

Need a hand? Various power-ups and boosts will help you to meet the challenges.

A bowling game has never been this exciting!

- Fantastic bowling alleys from around the world.
- Fantastic 20+ balls, pins and lanes to show off!
- Multiple mini-games to complete.
- Multiple game modes to play!

This bundle includes base game, expansion pack #1, expansion pack #3 and expansion pack #5 with:

-30 new bowling ball styles
70070000030808.intro: Fire up "Bowling Fever" and be carried away by the emotions!
70070000030808.name: Bowling Fever Strike Masters

70070000030916.description:
Pool Fever brings the classic game right to your Nintendo Switch™, perfect for beginners and pool sharks alike! 

Pool Fever offers a fun, accessible, and realistic billiards experience. With stunning 3D graphics and intuitive gameplay, you’ll feel like you’re playing in your favorite bar or pool hall. Whether you want to play in solo mode or challenge a friend in 2-player local multiplayer – either way, the table is set for hours of entertainment.

Choose from 10 different table designs, 15 unique cues, and 5 custom cue balls to create your perfect game setup. With three difficulty levels, you'll always have a challenge no matter your skill level.

So, chalk your cue, line up your shot, and sink the 8-ball - it’s game time!

Features:

10 different table designs 
15 unique cues sticks
5 custom cue balls 
3 difficulty levels
Play solo or in 2-player local multiplayer
Realistic 3D graphics

This bundle includes base game, expansion pack #1 and expansion pack #4 with:

10 new pool table designs
5 new pool cues designs
70070000030916.intro: The classic pool experience, right at home!
70070000030916.name: Pool Fever Cue to Glory

70070000031119.description:
Racers, beware! 

Fast-paced, polished and dynamic motorbike racing now on Nintendo Switch™!

One of a kind game entirely playable with... Toy-Con™ Motorbike!

Forget about speed limits and traffic rules 'cause on this road you're the boss!

A unique mix of endless and arcade racing game featuring countless hours of fun!

IN MOTO RUSH GT YOU WILL FIND:

• Over 100 levels to beat!
• Endless racing experience
• 12 customizable motorbikes
• Toy-Con™ Motorbike support
• Race against time, ghost opponents or try various challenges! 
• Motion Controls – play by rotating your console!
• Play with the Nintendo Switch™ Pro Controller
• Support all play styles - TV Mode, Tabletop Mode, Handheld Mode, Toy-Con™ Motorbike
• Experience 4 different game modes 
• Weather and day-cycle effects: rain, night, storm! 
• Experience beautifully designed roads around the world

This bundle includes base game, Full Garage and Grip Collection #4 with:

- 13 new vehicles—including an ATV and bicycle!
- 12 new gloves
70070000031119.intro: Ultimate motorbike racing experience for all ages!
70070000031119.name: Moto Rush GT Asphalt Fury

70070000031359.description:
Urban Flow is a game about the subtle beauty of city streets filled with cars moving in perfect harmony. But such order does not happen all by itself - the city needs YOU to control the traffic lights and to make sure everything goes smoothly. That means no crashes, no jams. Everything will run perfectly - as long as you stay focused!

Immerse yourself in a beautiful, hand-crafted, low-poly world to discover the enormous satisfaction of watching the hundreds of tiny, colorful cars flowing through the streets – all while listening to the chill, urban music.

Over 100 levels, each with its own busy intersection. You have one job: operate the lights and keep it safe.

Party Game (even if you party all alone!)
-----
 Play by yourself or with friends in scalable drop-in, drop-out local co-op mode for two, three, or four players!
You can help your friends or be a little rascal and spread the chaos!

Avoid accidents by paying close attention to special vehicles and to the other players. Special vehicles include the ambulance, which can’t wait for long, and the tank – which will plow through anything in its way.

Don’t want to play the campaign?
-----
 Try our score-based Endless Mode or the Chill Mode - where you play for as long as you want, no rush and no score - only you and the music. Urban Flow is designed to be a great single player experience!

Discover various environments and weather conditions. Play with touch controls, Nintendo Switch™ Pro Controllers or Joy-Con™. Complete challenges and unlock rewards.

This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack, Winter Expansion Pack and Streets Supplement #3 with:

•    New challenge mode offers medals - no more star system in challenge mode! You have to pass the challenge bar to pass the challenge mode stages.
•    40 new stages!
•    Winter theme and new music!
•    7 new vehicles, including the fire truck and snow plow!
70070000031359.intro: Manage the city lights and try to avoid the chaos!
70070000031359.name: Urban Flow Roads To Perfection

70070000031581.description:
Step behind the counter and take on the challenge of serving up delicious meals and perfectly brewed coffee in this fast-paced, classic cooking game. Work your way through 10 unique cafes, each with its own style and demands, as you master recipes, upgrade your equipment, and keep your customers happy. 

Outside the kitchen, bring new life to Grandma’s old house by decorating it with fun furniture and personal touches. Along the way, you’ll uncover a heartfelt story of friendships, family, and finding your place in a city full of contrasts. Whether you’re here for the cooking or the story, Pixel Cafe delivers an adventure full of charm and challenges.

This bundle includes base game, Living Room Touches and Bedroom Touches #2 with:

A new variant for the Armchair
A different look for the Computer
An alternative design for the Wardrobe
A modest update for the Bookshelf
A simple variant for the Bed
An alternative design for the Lamp
Also, mix things up with two new wallpapers suitable for any room!
70070000031581.intro: From kitchen chaos to cozy moments
70070000031581.name: Pixel Cafe Dreamy Interiors

70070000031900.description:
Love cooking games? Manage 9 distinct kitchens, craft over 500 dishes, and rise to culinary stardom across 1000+ fast-paced levels in Restaurant Tycoon: My Cooking Empire. Customize your home, unlock trophies, and bring the heat!

From street food to sushi, each kitchen will test your time-management skills as you work to satisfy impatient customers and hit your goals. But it’s not all about the kitchens—customize and upgrade your home to showcase your achievements, unlock trophies, and build a true empire!

Perfect for players of all ages, this game offers fast-paced fun that’s easy to pick up, but tough to master. Can you handle the heat and build your own cooking empire?

Key Features:

9 Unique Cuisines: Master a range of cooking styles and menus.
500+ Dishes: A global selection of recipes to perfect.
1000+ Levels: Challenge yourself with increasingly complex kitchens.
Home Customization: Upgrade your furniture and earn trophies to showcase your progress.
Fun & Fast-Paced: Simple to play, with endless hours of culinary excitement!

This bundle contains the base game and DLC#3- Creative Desk, with:
- new set of furniture for your Office!
70070000031900.intro: Universe bursting with flavors and culinary adventures awaits!
70070000031900.name: Restaurant Tycoon: My Cooking Empire - Cozy Corners

70010000106192.description:
Embark on a grand journey to the era of the pharaohs in Egypt City Builder — a strategy and simulation game where you lead your people to prosperity along the fertile banks of the Nile. Build, trade, and fight for the glory of your kingdom.
Key Features:
 • Construction & Development — Build and manage your city from the ground up. Expand your settlement with structures from simple homes to majestic temples.
 • Trade & Economy — Engage in commerce with neighboring cities. Trade grain, gold, papyrus, and gemstones to grow a prosperous economy.
 • Defensive Structures — Protect your capital with strong walls, watchtowers, and fortifications against enemy invasions.
 • Combat System — Take part in epic battles for land and resources. Command your warriors and develop strategies to secure victory.
 • Ancient Horrors — Face cursed mummies awakened from their tombs that spread fear among your people.
 • Hunting & Gathering — Explore the desert and oases to hunt and gather resources for survival.
 • Event System — Experience Nile floods, sandstorms, and political intrigue that can change the course of history.
 • Citizen Progression — Develop craftsmen, warriors, priests, and farmers to enhance your city’s efficiency.
Forge your legend in Egypt City Builder and create a civilization worthy of eternity.
70010000106192.intro: Build, expand and shape a glorious ancient empire.
70010000106192.name: Egypt City Builder

70010000107408.description:
Yuma, a first-year high school student, was eating lunch he had bought when a beautiful senpai, Mio, appeared before him.
She offered him a homemade bento, saying, "I couldn't finish it."
Thus begins a bittersweet youthful love story.
Their special lunchtime together on the bench behind the school gradually connects their hearts.
Through jealousy and misunderstandings, a story of first love blossoms.
Includes Japanese voice acting.
70010000107408.intro: A lunch break hidden from the world—our story alone.
70010000107408.name: Recipe of Love

70010000108746.description: A strange boy with an unusually large head appears at the edge of the sea. From that moment on, the mysteries grow increasingly insane, and it’s up to you to guide him through dangerous and twisted paths, avoiding capture, toward something terrible and unknown.
70010000108746.name: 1st Homizio

70070000031555.description:
In S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope you will shoot, you will fight, and you will win!

Play S.N.I.P.E.R., the latest sniping game where you aim, fight and destroy virtual enemies. Try different types of missions, inspired both by classic rail shooters and modern cover shooters. Fight your way out during day and night, destroy evil forces and unlock new weapons and power-ups.

Game includes:
15+ STAGES
30+ WEAPONS
30+ GALLERY ITEMS
60+ SPECIAL ACHIEVEMENTS 

Become a hunter, mount your scope, and fight for our freedom!

This bundle includes base game, Weaponry Upgrade and Expansion Pack #2 with:

-PIS-30-ARM pistol: a reliable sidearm 
-FMS-1-LEO rifle: a versatile and adaptable rifle for any situation 
-SN-1000-FUT sniper rifle: a state-of-the-art weapon with cutting-edge features for ultimate accuracy 
- FMS-1-G rifle
70070000031555.name: S.N.I.P.E.R. - Hunter Scope Hostile Territory

70010000087971.description:
Tribute Games and Dotemu are teaming up again, in collaboration with Marvel Games, to craft an original, fresh beat 'em up. Featuring dynamic combat combos and dazzling pixel art, this planet-hopping adventure stands as a love letter to the Marvel Universe.


“THE COSMOS MUST FALL SO THAT I MIGHT LIVE!!”

So swears Annihilus, the living death that walks!
After an unprecedented attack is launched across the galaxy, all life hangs in the balance.
Nova, Spider-Man, Wolverine, Phyla-Vell, Captain America and many more heroes, both earth-born and cosmic, will join forces in a star-spanning brawling adventure against the deadly Annihilation Wave.
From New York City to the depths of the Negative Zone, the future of the Universe will be fought for across the stars in MARVEL Cosmic Invasion!


15 PLAYABLE HEROES

Whether you’re an old-school expert or a first-time fan, you’ll find familiar faces and discover new favorites in a captivating roster of characters from across the Marvel Universe!


MASTER THE COSMIC SWAP TAG-TEAM SYSTEM

With the Cosmic Swap tag-team system, choose two heroes for each level and switch between them instantly. Create unique combos and powerful special attacks. Each character’s abilities encourage creative team-ups and a more tactical approach to the action.


AMAZING RETRO ART DIRECTION

MARVEL Cosmic Invasion is a tribute to one of Marvel’s most iconic eras, with stunning full-color pixel art designs.


INTUITIVE, FUN MULTIPLAYER FOR EVERYONE

Whether you're teaming up with friends or family, MARVEL Cosmic Invasion has you covered with local/online play and a drop-in/drop-out adaptive system. 


A cosmic battle awaits!
70010000087971.intro: A cosmic battle awaits in this Marvel frenetic action beat ‘em up!
70010000087971.name: MARVEL Cosmic Invasion

70010000103604.description:
Duck, dodge and toss. Los Pingheros is a multiplayer brawler for up to 8 players online or local. 
Join hectic battles in various modes and strive to become the ultimate Pinghero in Mexico by snowing your opponents out of the arena. 
 
ULTIMATE PENGUIN SHOWDOWN 
Join an exhilarating multiplayer action for memorable frenzied battles, playable with up to 8 players online and locally. 
Dive into the vibrant colors of Mexico, draped in a unique snowy mantle, and join the action alone or with your friends.

INTENSE BRAWL MODES
Prepare yourself for thrilling and diverse confrontations across a variety of modes, where only the most cunning penguins emerge victorious: 

	• Snowball School: This mode introduces players to the game’s mechanics through timed challenges, which can be completed either solo or up to 4 players.

	• Carnaval Cup: A chaotic mode where the rules change every round! It’s a wild mix of different game modes (details below). First to reach 12 Sols takes the cup!

	• Skill Storm: Power up your Pinghero with extra skills between rounds, ramping up the action and strategy with every battle!

	• Custom: Pick your rules, choose your maps, and create your own perfect showdown!

Secret Penguin Techniques - Access to the penguin's top survival tricks: the ultimate slide, the renowned penguin spinning top, and the celebrated "Made in Penguin" chokeslam, where your opponent definitely won't be pretending. 

Outsmart Your Opponents - Destroy the cacti to uncover power-ups. Be smart on how you use them! Keep an eye on the luchador mask that enrages your penguin, and game-changing items like the magic snowflake to freeze all other penguins to the bone.

The Mexican Dressing Room - Customize your penguins to reflect your unique style. As you progress, you unlock new clothing, hats, and color palettes. 

You are not alone - Watch out for your webbed feet ! In Mexico, you won't be alone. Slide in the wrong place and you might get bitten. 

Los Pingheros in a nutshell:
	• Up to 8 players local, online, or mixed
	• Play free for all or team with friends
	• Unique Snowy Mexican setting
	• Loads of power-ups and game modes
	• Cooperative Challenge mode
	• Destruct and construct the environment
	• Customize your Penguin and unlock even more as you progress!
70010000103604.intro: Los Pingheros: A multiplayer fighting game (8 players online/local). Battle in snowy, vibrant Mexico. Knock out opponents with snow to become the ultimate Pinghero
70010000103604.name: Los Pingheros

70010000110414.description:
Get ready to roll, jump, and think your way through a series of stunning 3D mazes!
Amazing Maze redefines the classic “roll-a-ball” experience with creative twists, parkour-inspired moves, and physics-based puzzles that challenge both your reflexes and your mind.

Collect the yellow cubes, find the exit, and master each maze with creativity and precision. Every challenge offers multiple paths and clever ways to escape — sometimes, thinking outside the box is the only way out!

Transform your sphere to gain special abilities like speed boost, jump, or wall climb. You’ll need to master when and how to use them to reach the goal in style. And yes — you can wall run and wall jump with a sphere!

With colorful visuals, satisfying physics, and countless ways to overcome obstacles, Amazing Maze is the perfect blend of logic, creativity, and arcade fun for all ages!
70010000110414.intro: Roll, jump, climb, and outsmart every maze in a colorful 3D world full of physics and surprises for all ages!
70010000110414.name: Amazing Maze

70070000030898.description:
Get ready to test your aim and precision in Darts Fever, the ultimate darts game experience!

Take on classic and exciting game modes like 201, 301, 501, Cricket, and Around the Clock. Whether you're sharpening your solo skills or challenging up to 3 friends in local multiplayer, Darts Fever delivers non-stop dart-throwing fun. 

An innovative aim mechanic and stunning 3D graphics make every game an authentic dart-throwing experience. And with motion-controlled Joy-Con™ support, you can truly feel the action as you throw your darts with realistic movement, just like you’re playing in a real-life pub match!

Grab your darts, take aim, and hit the bullseye!

6 unique board designs
10 custom dart styles
5 game modes
Single-player or up to 4 players multi-player
Motion control Joy-Con support
Realistic 3d Graphics and throwing mechanic

This bundle includes base game, Stylish Precision #1 and Stylish Precision #4 with:

10 brand-new dart designs
70070000030898.intro: Step Up to the toe line!
70070000030898.name: Darts Fever Bullseye Legends

70010000105548.description:
From cute arcade novelties to innovative text-based thrillers and acclaimed fourth wall-breaking stories, Simogo Legacy Collection is an eclectic celebration of Simogo's past, featuring faithful renditions of seven games released on mobile platforms between 2010 and 2015.

• Kosmo Spin
• Bumpy Road
• Beat Sneak Bandit
• Year Walk (+ Year Walk Companion)
• DEVICE 6
• The Sailor’s Dream
• SPL-T

Additionally, Simogo Legacy Collection features bonus content with thoughtfully curated curios from Simogo's wide-ranging history.

• Year Walk Bedtime Stories for Awful Children – E-book
• The Lighthouse Painting – Audio drama Podcast
• Music – Tracks from Simogo’s history, including previously unreleased tracks
• Images – Illustrations from Simogo’s archive
• Year Walk Prototype – Playable prototype
• Bumpy Road Prototype – Playable prototype
• Rollovski Prototype – Playable prototype
• The Sensational December Machine – Playable short story

Requires understanding of written and spoken English to be fully enjoyed.
70010000105548.name: Simogo Legacy Collection

70010000105828.description:
Brok, a former boxer turned detective, stumbles upon an underground bar hidden deep in the Slums. Old instincts kick in, and he jumps headfirst to prove he’s still top dog! (or...gator.)

Solo or with a friend in co-op, take on creative challenges inspired by "Event matches" of platform fighters, taken to the next level with original addictive mechanics and variety. In this gritty-yet-humorous bar, meet unforgettable characters and uncover surprises around every corner as the story unfolds.

- 60+ varied challenges, with unique mechanics
- 6 playable characters, each offering distinct abilities
- Local co-op for up to 4 players
- Creator mode: Build your own challenges
- Additional modes: Survival, Versus, Support, Daily and Bonus Challenges
- Multiple difficulty levels
- In-game achievements to unlock
- Text localized in 12 languages.

This game is part of the BROK the InvestiGator universe.
70010000105828.intro: A wild party beat 'em up with crazy challenges!
70010000105828.name: BROK: The Brawl Bar

70010000105899.description:
From cute arcade novelties to innovative text-based thrillers and acclaimed fourth wall-breaking stories, Simogo Legacy Collection is an eclectic celebration of Simogo's past, featuring faithful renditions of seven games released on mobile platforms between 2010 and 2015.

• Kosmo Spin
• Bumpy Road
• Beat Sneak Bandit
• Year Walk (+ Year Walk Companion)
• DEVICE 6
• The Sailor’s Dream
• SPL-T

Additionally, Simogo Legacy Collection features bonus content with thoughtfully curated curios from Simogo's wide-ranging history.

• Year Walk Bedtime Stories for Awful Children – E-book
• The Lighthouse Painting – Audio drama Podcast
• Music – Tracks from Simogo’s history, including previously unreleased tracks
• Images – Illustrations from Simogo’s archive
• Year Walk Prototype – Playable prototype
• Bumpy Road Prototype – Playable prototype
• Rollovski Prototype – Playable prototype
• The Sensational December Machine – Playable short story

Requires understanding of written and spoken English to be fully enjoyed.
70010000105899.name: Simogo Legacy Collection - Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition

70070000031658.description:
Get two complementary games set in the BROK universe at a reduced price !

This bundle includes:

BROK THE INVESTIGATOR – The world’s first Punch & Click! A unique adventure mixing classic storytelling and investigation with beat’em up action. Play as Brok, a private detective and former boxer, in a cyberpunk world where animals have replaced humans. Solve puzzles, uncover conspiracies, and fight your way through danger in a branching story with multiple endings.

BROK: THE BRAWL BAR – A standalone party beat’em up built on BROK’s combat system. Take on a variety of challenges, face waves of enemies, and enjoy local multiplayer with friends. Along the way, discover complementary story elements that expand the BROK universe.

- Two full games at a reduced price
- Experience a story-driven adventure and an action-focused beat’em up featuring the same characters
- Local co-op supported in both the main adventure and The Brawl Bar
- A great entry point into the BROK universe.
70070000031658.intro: Investigate by day, brawl by night!
70070000031658.name: BROK the InvestiGator + The Brawl Bar

70010000083225.description:
POPUCOM is a multiplayer co-op platform adventure game. As an adventurer, you are summoned to an unknown planet to embark on an exoplanet adventure with your friends. You will face various enemies and use engaging items and techniques to eliminate threats and restore the world to its former glory.

[Engage in Fun-filled Co-Op Gameplay]
Work together with your friends to take on a variety of challenges. Effective cooperation and strong teamwork are the only ways forward. Whether it's facing powerful enemies or tackling complex puzzles, you'll need to work together to triumph!

[Embark on a Colorful Adventure]
Color plays a crucial role in this fantastical world. It is key to everything from puzzle solving to combat. You'll need to switch colors to activate mechanisms and solve puzzles, and shoot Pomu gel in different colors to change the surroundings and impact enemies. Master the techniques of color switching and match-3 shooting to overcome puzzles and defeat enemies!

[Use Items to Work Miracles]
During the journey, you will acquire items known as super artifacts. Examples of these wondrous artifacts include Rollo the Bomb, Captain Kitty, Barrier Bot, and Power Kid. Each of them grants you a unique ability that helps remove obstacles and solve puzzles in your adventure.

[Let Your Style Shine]
The adventure isn't just about combat; it's also about showcasing your style! Pick from a selection of gear and cosmetics in the Closet and combine them to create your unique looks. Then you can set off on the journey in your personalized style!

[Enjoy Arcade Mini-Games]
In addition to the exciting battles and engaging puzzles, the game includes a number of enjoyable mini-games. Head to the in-game arcade room for some lighthearted arcade fun during breaks from the main stages.
70010000083225.name: POPUCOM

70010000096085.description:
Challenge perception, redefine reality, and reshape the world around you with an instant camera. Viewfinder is a new single player game offering gamers hours of interesting and fun experiences while uncovering the mysteries left behind.

About the game

Viewfinder is a mind-bending first person adventure game in which you can bring pictures to life by placing them into the world. 

•	Reshape Reality. Beyond photographs, bring paintings, sketches, screenshots and postcards to life while reshaping the world

•	Exploration is learning, the player will learn the secrets of the world, the reason why it exists, and the freedom to create. Explore multiple hub worlds that are all cohesive and encompass similar, but complex, differences.

•	Experience as much as you want. Viewfinder’s Narrative is player driven and will be an approachable experience to someone who just wants to play and solve puzzles, and a rich well thought off world to a player who wants to learn more. 

•	Find the answer to the impossible, once you step in the world of Viewfinder.
70010000096085.intro: A mind-bending first person adventure game
70010000096085.name: Viewfinder

70010000105131.description:
As Elias returns to the coastal town that once sheltered him, he’s pulled into a slow winter of connection, memory and quiet decisions. Take the role of this young man and guide the choices he makes, surrounded by the warmth of townspeople young and old, often holding conversations in a bookstore over shared coffee.

Winterlight is a contemplative visual novel adventure about coming home, facing grief and learning to accept the ordinary over means of personal escape. Enjoy an adventure in a branching narrative with meaningful choices, one filled with emotional maturity and beautiful illustrations. Take things at your own pace as you explore all possible outcomes for Elias.

• Immerse yourself in an adventure spanning 32,000 words!
• Engage in emotionally mature themes and real-world issues.
• Guide the narrative by making key decisions for Elias!
• Enjoy beautifully illustrated character portraits and backdrops.
• Discover multiple endings as you seek truth and lasting peace!
70010000105131.intro: Explore a heartfelt and thought-provoking tale of bittersweet homecoming!
70010000105131.name: Winterlight - Where silence says it all

70010000106674.description:
- Overview
Place panels with various effects on a 3×3 grid field and aim to clear the stage by pairing up all the characters on the field.
The Nintendo Switch™ version adds 40 brand-new stages, bringing the total to a whopping 116 stages!

 - Gender
By default, couples are formed between a boy and a girl, but in the options you can change the settings to allow pairings such as boy-boy or girl-girl. There are also additional customization options available, such as clothing, hairstyles, and age.

 - Story
The protagonist is a woman in pajamas, as seen in the main visual. Her profession is a romance novelist.
Whenever she comes up with ideas for her novels, she never skips her mental simulations. In her mind, she creates couples, makes them talk, go on dates, and flirt with each other-gradually expanding the image of her story.
This game (a puzzle game about forming couples) represents her fantasies-or rather, the work she does to pay her bills.
70010000106674.intro:
It’s a puzzle game where you create couples.
You can freely choose the pairings-man and woman, two men, two women, and more!
70010000106674.name: Couple Maker

70010000107523.description:
Lonely Guardian is a relaxing and accessible 2D platformer where you play as a Foo Dog, a mythical creature from East Asian culture. Your sacred mission is simple: collect the Mystic Pearl, rescue a lost pup, and reach the temple gate in each level.

With clear and intuitive gameplay, the game combines light exploration, precise jumps, and a purifying roar that defeats yokai, breaks stone blocks, and opens hidden paths. Everything is designed to be instantly understood, without tutorials or complicated menus.

Each stage is a short and rewarding challenge, requiring attention, timing, and quick thinking to traverse fixed, moving, or collapsing platforms, avoid dangerous spikes, and activate spiritual altars as checkpoints.

The adventure features 30 levels divided into two unique biomes:

Sacred Temple Ruins (Levels 1–15): a serene setting of stone courtyards overgrown by nature, where players learn the core mechanics in a welcoming environment.

Forest of Echoes (Levels 16–30): a mysterious nocturnal realm lit by floating lanterns, where more aggressive yokai and new hazards raise the challenge.

With its spiritual atmosphere, clean visuals, and engaging progression, Lonely Guardian is the perfect experience for fans of casual, charming, and mystical platformers.
70010000107523.name: Lonely Guardian

70050000063525.description:

70050000065009.description:

70050000065039.description:
Embark on a journey from Rhodes Island to Pancake!

Purchase the [POPUCOM X ARKNIGHTS Collab Outfit Pack] for limited collab outfits!

The DLC contains:

Fashion Without Limits!
